author: cortze
content: Hey there, I'm trying to get the Index of the validator that has to propose the block on a certain slot and I'm wonder how does DomainType interact on the following function

author: cortze
content:
`def get_seed(state: BeaconState, epoch: Epoch, domain_type: DomainType) -> Bytes32:
    mix = get_randao_mix(state, Epoch(epoch + EPOCHS_PER_HISTORICAL_VECTOR - MIN_SEED_LOOKAHEAD - 1))  # Avoid underflow
    return hash(domain_type + uint_to_bytes(epoch) + mix)`

author: cortze
content:
the documentation is taken from ethereum/sth2.0-specs
https://mdlol.github.io/md/?r=ethereum/eth2.0-specs&p=specs/phase0/beacon-chain.md#tip79

author: ralexstokes
content: you want the result of the spec function `get_beacon_proposer_index`

author: ralexstokes
content: the state supplied to that function has to be in the epoch you are interested in

author: ralexstokes
content: you can see in that function that we use `DOMAIN_BEACON_PROPOSER` as a "domain separation tag"

author: ralexstokes
content: to end up w/ a different series of seeds, compared to say the committee shufflings
